it is the best app around, but not perfect. it lacks a REAL skip silence 
feature: such that it automatically stops the recording when sound gets 
below a threshold AND restarts automatically when a sound over the 
threshold is sensed! furthermore the notes are great but they are not 
exportable: i would put them in a txt next to the the recording, or, even 
better, place them in the subtitles of the recording, if supported.

Love it, especially since it now has notes for during recording or even 
playback. Requested for while. YAY! Now if it only had day of week in 
time-day stamp AND built-in editing/truncating (so u could remove start or 
end parts not needed, like when I forget to turn RECORD off), it'd be 6 
stars!!! :)
replyContent: We are hoping to add audio editing functionality.
